propertiesClass.name: activeDatapoints
propertiesClass.description: Represents the data points where __active property is set to true.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Represents the data points where __active property is set to true.

propertiesClass.name: containerClass
propertiesClass.description: Represents the custom CSS style for the export selector component.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Represents the custom CSS style for the export selector component.

propertiesClass.name: datapointsTableItems
propertiesClass.description: An array of GroupedDatapointTableItem objects representing the datapoints table items. Used to populate the table with data.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
An array of `GroupedDatapointTableItem` objects representing the datapoints table items.
Used to populate the table with data.

propertiesClass.name: datapointsWithValues
propertiesClass.description: An array of objects representing datapoints with their corresponding values. Used to populate the CSV/Excel file with data.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
An array of objects representing datapoints with their corresponding values.
Used to populate the CSV/Excel file with data.

propertiesClass.name: exportConfig
propertiesClass.description: Represents a configuration options used by a c8y-datapoints-export-selector.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Represents a configuration options used by a c8y-datapoints-export-selector.

propertiesClass.name: hasMultipleDatapoints
propertiesClass.description: Indicates whether there is more than one data point. If is true, then a column 'Device' will be displayed in the table.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Indicates whether there is more than one data point.
If is true, then a column 'Device' will be displayed in the table.

propertiesClass.name: isInitialRequest
propertiesClass.description: Indicates whether the component is in the initial request state where data for a table structure is being prepared.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Indicates whether the component is in the initial request state
where data for a table structure is being prepared.

propertiesClass.name: isLoading$
propertiesClass.description: Current isLoading state. Indicates whether the data is being loaded.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Current isLoading state. Indicates whether the data is being loaded.

propertiesClass.name: isRefreshDisabled
propertiesClass.description: Indicates whether refreshing should be enabled or disabled. It's 'true' when user is not allowed to view a measurements.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Indicates whether refreshing should be enabled or disabled.
It's 'true' when user is not allowed to view a measurements.
